name: .LQR File Extension
summary: Learn about .LQR files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To decompress an LQR file, and retrieve the LBR file it contains, use Squeez or another Squeeze decompression utility. For a list of programs that can expand LBR files, refer to the How to Open section of the .LBR entry.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
